domain_terms.Cloud Model: Deployment model - Public, Private, Hybrid, or Multi-cloud
domain_terms.Region: Geographic data center location for cloud resources
domain_terms.Availability Zone: Isolated fault domain within a cloud region
domain_terms.IaC: Infrastructure as Code - Declarative infrastructure provisioning
domain_terms.Service Model: Cloud service abstraction level - IaaS, PaaS, SaaS
domain_terms.Cloud Native: Applications designed specifically for cloud environments

framework_description: cloud models, service justification, multi-region design, and IaC
